import React, {Component, useState} from 'react' import { Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import translate from '../i18n/translate'; import {I18nProvider, LOCALES} from '../i18n'; const Home = () => { const[locale, setLocale] = useState(LOCALES.ENGLISH); return(


{translate("hello")}

{translate('about')}









{translate('cute')}

Adoption Process









Step1: Click the Adoption button on the top right to browse all categories of pets

Step2: Choose the type of pets that you are interested in

Step3: Browse all our pets, click button or picture to reserve an appointment

Step4: Please click Help for more information





 ) } export default Home;
